In England, in the seven days to 14 April, there were 15,093 new confirmed cases (26.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 07 April, there were 16,297 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 7% (1,204 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 19 April is 3,836,833 (6,816.6 cases per 100,000 population).
